moves.name: Sheer Cold
moves.description: The target is attacked with a blast of absolute-zero cold. The target instantly faints if it hits.

moves.name: Night Slash
moves.description: The user slashes the target the instant an opportunity arises. Critical hits land more easily.

moves.name: Ice Shard
moves.description: The user flash freezes chunks of ice and hurls them at the target. This move always goes first.

moves.name: Mist
moves.description: The user cloaks its body with a white mist that prevents any of its stats from being cut for five turns.

moves.name: Haze
moves.description: The user creates a haze that eliminates every stat change among all the Pokémon engaged in battle.

moves.name: Bind
moves.description: Things such as long bodies or tentacles are used to bind and squeeze the target for four to five turns.

moves.name: Ice Shard
moves.description: The user flash freezes chunks of ice and hurls them at the target. This move always goes first.

moves.name: Sharpen
moves.description: The user reduces its polygon count to make itself more jagged, raising the Attack stat.

moves.name: Rapid Spin
moves.description: A spin attack that can also eliminate such moves as Bind, Wrap, Leech Seed, and Spikes.

moves.name: Icy Wind
moves.description: The user attacks with a gust of chilled air. It also reduces the targets' Speed stat.

moves.name: Mist
moves.description: The user cloaks its body with a white mist that prevents any of its stats from being cut for five turns.

moves.name: Haze
moves.description: The user creates a haze that eliminates every stat change among all the Pokémon engaged in battle.

moves.name: Aurora Beam
moves.description: The target is hit with a rainbow-colored beam. This may also lower the target's Attack stat.

moves.name: Acid Armor
moves.description: The user alters its cellular structure to liquefy itself, sharply raising its Defense stat.

moves.name: Ice Beam
moves.description: The target is struck with an icy-cold beam of energy. It may also freeze the target solid.

moves.name: Light Screen
moves.description: A wondrous wall of light is put up to suppress damage from special attacks for five turns.

moves.name: Reflect
moves.description: A wondrous wall of light is put up to suppress damage from physical attacks for five turns.

moves.name: Slash
moves.description: The target is attacked with a slash of claws or blades. Critical hits land more easily.

moves.name: Confuse Ray
moves.description: The target is exposed to a sinister ray that triggers confusion.

moves.name: Recover
moves.description: Restoring its own cells, the user restores its own HP by half of its max HP.

moves.name: Freeze-Dry
moves.description: The user rapidly cools the target. This may also leave the target frozen. This move is super effective on Water types.

moves.name: Solar Beam
moves.description: A two-turn attack. The user gathers light, then blasts a bundled beam on the second turn.

moves.name: Night Slash
moves.description: The user slashes the target the instant an opportunity arises. Critical hits land more easily.

moves.name: Sheer Cold
moves.description: The target is attacked with a blast of absolute-zero cold. The target instantly faints if it hits.
